mapper.select: /* Board - list */ Select b_num, j.id, b_title, readcnt, cg_num, b_content, writeday, b_like, thumbnail From r_board b,r_join j where b.num=j.num order by b_num desc
mapper.update: UPDATE r_board SET readcnt = readcnt +1 WHERE b_num = #{b_num}
UPDATE r_board SET b_like = b_like +1 WHERE b_num = #{b_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO R_join (num, id, passwd, name, nickname, email, phone) VALUES(r_join_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phone})
mapper.delete: /* Board - delete */ delete from r_board where b_num = #{b_num}
mapper.select: select NVL((SELECT 1 from r_board where b_num = #{b_num} AND b_pwd = #{b_pwd}),0) as result From dual
